description: Peterborough United's wait for a League One victory stretches to a month but they stop play-off-chasing Leyton Orient's five-game winning run with a goalless draw.
title: Peterborough United 0-0 Leyton Orient
title_page: League One: Peterborough United 0-0 Leyton Orient - BBC Sport
maintext:
Peterborough United are unbeaten across their last six Football League games against Leyton Orient (W4 D2), scoring exactly two goals in four of those matches.
Leyton Orient have won just one of their last 10 away Football League games against Peterborough United (D4 L5), keeping just a single clean sheet during that time.
Peterborough have lost each of their last two home league games and will be looking to avoid recording three successive such defeats for the first time since February 2022 in the Championship.
Leyton Orient have won each of their last five league games and will be looking to win six in succession for the first time since September 2022.
